ComicInfo.Penciller: Darren Douglas,Greg Staples,John Burns,Neil Googe,Patrick Goddard
ComicInfo.Summary:
Happy birthday, 2000 AD! We celebrate 38 years of Thrill-power this week with a zarjaz new cover by veteran art droid John Higgins, showing 2000 AD’s editor, Tharg the Mighty, in all his munificent glory! Inside the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: things heat up in Judge Dredd: Dark Justice by John Wagner and Greg Staple; the Survival Geeks have their heads in the clouds in Steampunk’d by Gordon Rennie, Emma Beeby, Neil Googe, and Gary Caldwell; the worm turns in The Order by Kek-W and John Burns; will Bill be on target in Savage: Grinders by Pat Mills and Patrick Goddard; and is this the final stop in Tharg’s 3riller: Station to Station by Eddie Robson and Darren Douglas?
Cover: John Higgins
Judge Dredd - Dark Justice (Part Nine) (John Wagner - Greg Staples)Survival Geeks - Steampunk'd (Part Two) (Gordon Rennie - Emma Beeby - Neil Googe)Tharg's 3rillers Presents Station To Station (Part Two) (Eddie Robson - Darren Douglas)The Order (Part Nine) (Kek-W - John Burns)Savage Book 9 - Grinders (Part Nine) (Pat Mills - Patrick Goddard)
